summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for the month of October 2017. It includes information on debits, credits, and the ending balance of the account, as well as specific transactions involving various payments and transfers.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Mehmet Arda Beskardes
persons.context: Mehmet Arda Beskardes is referenced in relation to a transfer of funds to his account.

connections.description: Stewart Oldfield is associated with the account management for transactions involving Mehmet Arda Beskardes.

events.title: Transfer to Attorney's Account
events.description: A transfer of funds was made to the account of Mehmet Arda Beskardes, Esq.

keyFacts: The document details account transactions for Deutsche Bank from October 1, 2017, to October 31, 2017.
Stewart Oldfield is listed as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.
A significant transaction includes a transfer of $33,000.00 to the account of Mehmet Arda Beskardes, Esq.
The ending balance of the account as of October 31, 2017, is $561,159.87.
Multiple preauthorized debits and fees are recorded throughout the month.
